title: PSA to everyone who plays ranked
body:
When Kled is released, he is a pick or ban for everyone in every ELO.

Tank champion with a Sivir Ultimate and a second health bar that is so easy to get back.

Legitimately has to be one of the stupidest champion releases recently (and yes i know it's not even out yet, but he won't be nerfed enough if at all).

replies.body: Holy shit you complain about everything if you hate so much about this game then just quit really

His ult is bs af, so disappointed they made it like that. its so lame and unoriginal not to mention way to op and although it kinda works with his kit I think it should have been more like a sion ult because in what universe does that tiny thing kick up all that fast moving stuff for an entire team?? and why does he bounce around on top ... so lame, please change.

Or he'll be nerfed hard and ascend to aurelion sol status.

Seriously .87% pick rate cmon people

Ohmygosh don't be such a buhba http://holykaw.alltop.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/9436653177_fd00cc9d2c_b-744x420.jpg Just adaaaaaapt :/ http://www.relatably.com/m/img/heavy-memes/c62.jpg and if you get a team with 1-4 feeding trolls any way, just imagine they're a bunch of annoying kids that your babysitting and you just need to sit out through half an hour or so more more and just meh :'Y to avoid any unwanted extra stress OR CARRY THEM. http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/2jhG7_4TduA/hqdefault.jpg Oh and report -.- http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/y3y9Hcgn-aram-team-serious-aram-players-only?comment=0009
